structure.unit: ARTICLE II. BIDDING ON PUBLIC PROJECTS

text.section:
Sec. 10-33.01. Applicability of article.
To County government. The provisions of this article shall be applicable to all departments, agencies and instrumentalities, instrumentalities and legal entities created by the Board of County Commissioners of Miami-Dade County, Florida.
To municipalities. Unless specifically adopted by a municipality, this article does not apply to any municipality.
